definition: to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

pinyin: zheng4 dian4 zi3 zhao4 she4 duan4 ceng2 she4 ying3

sentences.english: The results showed that the reflectivities varied during the wound healing process.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示激光照射劑量對傷口組織的反射率影響不大。

sentences.english: The shower is over and the sun is breaking through the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 陣雨已過，太陽已從雲縫中照射出來了。

sentences.english: In the morning sunshine, underwater world was beautiful vi-sion.
sentences.chinese: 在早晨陽光的照射下，海底世界美得如夢如幻。

sentences.english: The firelight danced over her face, over the steep lines of her cheekbones.
sentences.chinese: 爐火在她的臉龐上跳動，照射出她高高的顴骨的線條。

sentences.english: Under the sunshine, the water of Kanas Lake is resplendent with colors.
sentences.chinese: 你看，在陽光的照射下，喀納斯湖的湖水流光異彩。

sentences.english: Her face was browned. It was clear that was affected by strong ultraviolet rays .
sentences.chinese: 臉是棕色的，顯然是受了強烈紫外線照射的影響。

sentences.english: Weak green-yellow fluorescence under UV light.
sentences.chinese: 紫外光照射發弱綠黃色熒光。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanisms of ultraviolet blood irradiation and oxygenation (UBIO) for psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫外線照射充氧自血回輸治療銀屑病的機制。

sentences.english: We irradiate the desert with slow neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 我們用低速中子照射整個沙漠。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the effects of progesterone on nasal mucosa in acute rhinitis rat models.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氦氖激光照射對急性鼻炎患者的治療作用。

sentences.english: Occupational radiation dose was detected by TLD dose meter.
sentences.chinese: 職業外照射劑量，採用TLD劑量計測得。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of He-Ne laser irradiation on acute rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氦氖激光照射對急性鼻炎患者的治療作用。

sentences.english: Actually - every part of the moon is illuminated by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 事實上月球完全被太陽照射着。

sentences.english: However, in the case of ultraviolet irradiation, the stage of appearance of embryo revealed the highest sensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 對紫外線照射的感受性，則以胚體出現期爲最高。

sentences.english: Hemopoietic pro-genitor cells, hematopoietic stem cells, hematopoietic microenvironment etc. show dose related damage after irradiation, consequently, hematopoietic function is destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 等都會產生與照射劑量相關的損傷而影響造血機能。

sentences.english: In summer the sun beats down on the roof, so that the upper rooms become unbearably hot.
sentences.chinese: 夏天炎日照射屋頂，頂層的房間熱得受不了。

definition: to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
